mapper.select: SELECT * FROM feed WHERE feed_tag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{feedTag}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed (feed_id, user_key, feed_comment_id, feed_file_id, feed_content, feed_create_dt, feed_update_dt, feed_tag) VALUES (#{feedId}, #{userKey}, #{feedCommentId} NULL, #{feedFileId}, #{feedContent}, #{feedCreateDt}, #{feedUpdateDt} NULL, #{feedTag})
INSERT INTO feed_file (feed_file_id, feed_file_type, feed_file_name_org, feed_file_name, feed_upload_dt) VALUES (#{feedFileId}, #{feedFileType}, #{feedFileNameOrg}, #{feedFileName}, #{feedUploadDt})
